response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation of its worth, I am pleased to offer you the chance to own this item at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its true value of $1,200,000, and I believe it presents an excellent investment opportunity for you. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
